CustomField.description: Allows you to replace the current version of the template with this version.
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT(isblank(SDOC__Master_Template__c)) , HYPERLINK("/apex/SDOC__SDRedirect?redirectPage=SDOC__SDRestoreTemplate&restoreId=" + Id + "&currentId=" + SDOC__Master_Template__c + "&currentName=" + SDOC__Master_Template__r.Name, IMAGE("/img/func_icons/util/ileUndo16.gif","Restore"), '_self'), null )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Allows you to replace the current version of the template with this version.
CustomField.label: Restore Link
